New Records: India won their sixth consecutive match in the ICC Men's Cricket World Cup 2023
Key Match Events: Rohit Sharma scored 87 runs for India
Mohammed Shami took 4/22 and Jasprit Bumrah took 3/32 for India
England lost all ten wickets for just 99 runs
Jasprit Bumrah took a double strike to stop England in their tracks
Mohammed Shami bowled Ben Stokes in an intriguing head-to-head battle
Post-Match Reflections: India's pacers Jasprit Bumrah and Mohammed Shami ripped through the England top-order
India's sixth consecutive win sends them top of the table, two points clear of South Africa in second
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was dominated by the ball, with England restricting India to 229/9 in their 50 overs
The defending champions had a target of 230 to aim for and had the bonus of dew on the outfield to limit the impact of India's spinners
